/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, mountains rise against the horizon, adding depth and a sense of vastness to the image.
